page.title: 05AN AYLMERTON HOUSEWIFE
page.content: The housewife has lived in Aylmerton for twelve years and originally came from Aldborough. She does not go out to work and her children go by bus to Gresham Primary School as the school at Aylmerton has been closed down. As the village is not adequately served by public transport, she travels by car to Cromer for her shopping and also to visit the dentist, and travels to Aldborough to see her doctor. She does not use the village shop, Public House, Post Office, garage, church or village hall. There are few opportunities in the village for 'get_togethers' with other housewives, more coffee mornings and similar events would be welcomed. Children are also faced with a lack of facilities and organised events.
